info.description: This is a simple API for test
info.title: BingMap Locations API

get.description: Get the latitude and longitude coordinates based on a set of address values for any country

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: adminDistrict
parameters.description: The subdivision name in the country or region for an address. This element is typically treated as the first order administrative subdivision, but in some cases it is the second, third, or fourth order subdivision in a country, dependency, or region.

parameters.name: locality
parameters.description: The locality, such as the city or neighborhood, that corresponds to an address.

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: The post code, postal code, or ZIP Code of an address.

parameters.name: addressLine
parameters.description: The official street line of an address relative to the area, as specified by the Locality, or PostalCode, properties. Typical use of this element would be to provide a street address or any official address.

parameters.name: countryRegion
parameters.description: The ISO country code for the country.

parameters.name: includeNeighborhood
parameters.description: Specifies to include the neighborhood in the response when it is available.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specifies additional values to include.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of locations to return in the response.

parameters.name: strictMatch
parameters.description: Restricts the geocode result to the country or region that is specified in the countryRegion field and the state, province or territory specified in the adminDistrict field.

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

get.description: Get an address for a specified point (latitude and longitude).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: includeEntityTypes
parameters.description: Specifies the entity types that you want to return in the response

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: The coordinates of the location that you want to reverse geocode

parameters.name: includeNeighborhood
parameters.description: Specifies to include the neighborhood in the response when it is available.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specifies additional values to include.

parameters.name: verboseplacenames
parameters.description: If true: AdminDistrict names will be in expanded

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

get.description: Return latitude and longitude coordinates for a location specified by a query

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A string that contains information about a location, such as an address or landmark name.

parameters.name: includeNeighborhood
parameters.description: Specifies to include the neighborhood in the response when it is available.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specifies additional values to include.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of locations to return in the response.

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

get.description: Get an address for a specified point (latitude and longitude).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: The coordinates of the location that you want to reverse geocode

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius in kilometers (KM).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The maximum number of entities returned.

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: Date and time at which the location is visited, in UTC format

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: Unit for the radius parameter

parameters.name: verboseplacenames
parameters.description: If true: admin1 names will be in expanded form

parameters.name: includeEntityTypes
parameters.description: Specifies the entity types that you want to return in the response

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: if includeEntityTypes is businessAndPOI, type is required.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Output format for the response.

200.description: One or more Location resources are returned in the response when you make a request by using these URL templates

get.description: Make a Local Search API request based on a string query by specifying a user location.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: if searching by query. The query used to search for local entities.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Either query or type is required, not both

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of locations to return in the response.

parameters.name: userCircularMapView
parameters.description: A circular geographic region

parameters.name: userLocation
parameters.description: If userMapView and userCircularMapView are not present, userLocation is required

parameters.name: userMapView
parameters.description: If userMapView and userCircularView are not present, userLocation is required

200.description: Successful Local Search API requests return a list of LocalSearch resources.
